heroDescription: Orem, Utah, a growing city in Utah County, is known for its family-friendly environment and vibrant community.
landscapeDescription: Orem's economy is diverse, with a strong emphasis on technology, education, and healthcare. The city benefits from proximity to Provo and a growing population.
uniqueNeeds: Orem's rapid growth necessitates infrastructure development and affordable housing solutions.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Orem's tech focus poses risks from market volatility; housing demand may inflate prices, risking a bubble. Prepare for natural disasters like flooding and diversify economically.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Orem's economy has grown by 4.5% annually, driven by tech and education sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Orem is $70,000, reflecting a stable economic environment.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Orem are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and tech investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Orem's cost of living is 10% lower than the national average, making it attractive for new residents.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Orem's housing market is competitive, with prices rising 8% over the past year due to high demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Orem's business climate is favorable, with low taxes and support for startups, particularly in tech.
